scenes.text: My smart toaster gives relationship advice... I need bread, not love tips!
It's hooked up to Tinder, analyzing my mornings. 'Swipe left on burnt, swipe right on golden!'
Imagine waking up to 'You have a burnt connection with Bagel.' How's that for breakfast drama?
So, now I'm single with a toaster wingman. Swipe right... or wait, is it left? #TechHumor #SmartToast #RelationshipAdvice

config.caption: When your toaster becomes your relationship guru... Swipe left on burnt love! üçûüíîüòÇ #TechComedy #ToasterTherapy #SwipeRightToBread
